Linux-Cylon
===========
 1. cd ${WORKSPACE}
 2. . CommandScripts/LinuxTools/SetCylonEnv.sh
 3. cd ~
 4. mkdir boost
 5. cd boost
 6. tar -xvjf ${COMMON_THIRDPARTY_HOME}/boost/boost_1_76_0.tar.bz2
 7. cd boost_1_76_0
 8. sudo rsync -rlptDWv boost/ ${CROSS_COMPILE_FULL_HOST}/usr/include/boost/
 9. . ${COMMON_SCRIPT_HOME}/SetJenkinsEnvLinux.sh
10. ./bootstrap.sh --with-libraries=date_time,regex,system,log --prefix=/usr
11. Edit project-config.jam.  Replace "using gcc ;" with
      "using gcc : arm : arm-angstrom-linux-gnueabi-g++ ;"
12. . ${COMMON_SCRIPT_HOME}/SetCylonEnv.sh
13. ./b2 variant=release link=shared threading=multi
14. cp stage/lib/libboost*.so.1.76.0 ${COMMON_THIRDPARTY_LIB_PATH_RELEASE}
15. Add/update the new library files in to the TFS.
16. The local ~/boost directory can now be removed.

Linux-Ubuntu
============
 1. cd ${WORKSPACE}
 2. . CommandScripts/LinuxTools/SetLinuxEnv.sh
 3. cd ~
 4. mkdir boost
 5. cd boost
 6. tar -xvjf ${COMMON_THIRDPARTY_HOME}/boost/boost_1_76_0.tar.bz2
 7. sudo mkdir /usr/local/include/boost
 8. cd boost_1_76_0
 9. sudo rsync -rlptDWv boost/ /usr/local/include/boost/
10. ./bootstrap.sh --with-libraries=date_time,regex,system,log
11. ./b2 variant=release link=shared threading=multi
12. cp stage/lib/libboost*.so.1.76.0 ${COMMON_THIRDPARTY_LIB_PATH_RELEASE}
13. Add/update the new library files in to the TFS.
14. The local ~/boost directory can now be removed.

Windows
=======
1. Run the 7-Zip archiver as administrator.
2. Select CommonSDK\source\ThirdParty\Boost\boost_1_76_0.7z and click Extract
3. Check the "Eliminate duplication of root folder" check box and extract to
   C:\Program Files\boost (e.g. resulting in the creation of the    C:\Program Files\boost\boost_1_76_0 directory.)
3. Run cmd.exe as an administrator.
4. cd "\Program Files\boost\boost_1_76_0"
5. bootstrap
6.
for 32bit libraries (when changing to a new Visual Studio version, modify --toolset=msvc-14.2 to be the new toolset version)
b2 --builddir=./build/Win32 --stagedir=./stage/Win32 address-model=32 --build-type=complete --toolset=msvc-14.2 --threading=multi --runtime-link=shared --variant=release debug-symbols=on -j 12

if 64bit libraries are needed
b2 --builddir=./build/x64 --stagedir=./stage/x64 address-model=64 --build-type=complete --toolset=msvc-14.2 --threading=multi --runtime-link=shared --variant=debug debug-symbols=on -j 12

7. The boost system library files are now in:
   C:\Program Files\boost\boost_1_76_0\bin.v2\libs
   
!! The following steps are only needed when updating the project to a new boost version !!

8. Modify CopyBinaries.bat to change the BoostBinFolder to the new boost version path and MSVCVersion to the new Visual Studio toolset version.
9. Run CopyBinaries.bat to Copy the dll, lib, and pdb files from the appropriate directories above to:
   CommonSDK\source\ThirdParty\lib\WinHost\Debug
   CommonSDK\source\ThirdParty\lib\WinHost\Release
10. Add and commit the new files in %COMMON_THIRDPARTY_HOME% to the Common ThirdParty repository.
11. Modify CommonSDK\source\CMakeInclude.txt to change all the boost references to the new version of boost and the new version of msvc. 
12. Modify MxDispatch Additional Include directories to change to the new boost version
